creator: ken_yap_aus@yahoo.com
text:
Is anybody else having problems with this tarball? Its length is
8129039, shorter than 0.20-3 by the way and when I try to unpack it
with tar ztvf ..., I get:

...
-rw-r--r-- chrisg/users 2163538 2002-07-06 04:06:18 fop-0.20.4/lib/batik.jar

gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--format violated
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now

Surely someone must have put this bug in but I don't see it in the DB so
sorry if this is a dupe.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Compressed files can be corrupted during download. The original is certainly ok.
Download it again, perhaps using another client.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
